sentences.en: A good dose of tonic will help you to pick up.
sentences.cn: 一剂好的补品将有助于身体康复。

sentences.en: a lethal dose of poison
sentences.cn: 毒药的致死剂量

sentences.en: A medium dose produces severe nausea within hours.
sentences.cn: 中等剂量几小时之内会引发严重的恶心。

sentences.en: All have a generous dose of herbs and spices, everything from chervil and celery seed to cloves and peppercorns.
sentences.cn: 从山萝卜到芹菜籽，从丁香到胡椒籽，每一样均含有大剂量的药草和香料成分。

sentences.en: computer games are great in small doses.
sentences.cn: 电脑游戏每次只玩一会儿是很好的。

sentences.en: He gave me a dose of medicine for my cold.
sentences.cn: 他给我开了一剂治感冒的药.

sentences.en: I gave him an extra dose of glucose to pep him up.
sentences.cn: 我给他多注射了一剂葡萄糖以增强他的活力.

sentences.en: I quite like Jamie in small doses (= in limited amounts but not a lot or often ) .
sentences.cn: 如果偶尔在一起的话，我还是蛮喜欢杰米的。

sentences.en: In short, we badly need another very big dose of stimulus.
sentences.cn: 简言之，我们很需要另一个很大剂量的刺激计划。

sentences.en: In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation.
sentences.cn: 在那次事故中, 工人受到大剂量的辐射.

sentences.en: Never exceed the recommended dose of painkillers
sentences.cn: 服用止痛药不可超过建议的剂量。

sentences.en: One dose of penicillin can wipe out the infection.
sentences.cn: 一剂青霉素即可消除感染。

sentences.en: She has gone to bed and had a dose of castor oil.
sentences.cn: 她服用了一剂蓖麻油，已经上床睡了。

sentences.en: She was born with a healthy dose of self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 她天生就充满自信。

sentences.en: Someone had fed him a lethal dose of cyanide.
sentences.cn: 有人给他下了致命剂量的氰化物。

sentences.en: Take this dose of medicine on an empty stomach.
sentences.cn: 空心吃这剂药.

sentences.en: That man gave her a dose of opium.
sentences.cn: 那男人给了她一剂鸦片.

sentences.en: The film also contains a hefty dose of comedy.
sentences.cn: 这部电影同样带有浓厚的喜剧色彩.

sentences.en: The recommended daily dose is 12 to 24 grams.
sentences.cn: 建议每天的服用剂量为12到24克。

sentences.en: The West is getting a heavy dose of snow and rain today.
sentences.cn: 西部今天将迎来一场大的雨夹雪。

sentences.en: There are other questions too, including what dose of green tea catechins is ideal.
sentences.cn: 也有一些别的问题，包括多少剂量的绿茶儿茶素是理想的。

sentences.en: we'll go through this place like a dose of salts and scrub it from top to bottom.
sentences.cn: 我们会很快把这个地方从顶到底擦干净。

sentences.en: What you need is a good dose of laughter.
sentences.cn: 你需要的是大笑一场.

words.tran_cn: [临床] 剂量学；放射量测定
定量给料，配量；精密分注

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)一次一点地，慢慢地，少量地

trans.tran_cn: （药的）一服，一剂，一份，一次，一点
trans.tran_en: the amount of a medicine or a drug that you should take
to give someone medicine or a drug
to give someone medicine or a drug
